snippet: In Miami-Dade County, news of Hugo Chávez’s death elicited outpourings of raucous celebration and, to many, cautious optimism for the future.
abstract: News of Hugo Chavez's death elicits outpourings of raucous celebration in Miami-Dade County, Florida, where more Venezuelan expatriates live than anywhere else in country and where Chavez is particularly reviled.
lead_paragraph: In Miami-Dade County, news of Hugo Chávez’s death elicited outpourings of raucous celebration and, to many, cautious optimism for the future.

headline.main: Venezuelan Expatriates See a Reason to Celebrate
headline.print_headline: Venezuelan Expatriates See a Reason to Celebrate
